text: Félix Suárez (6 December 1950 - 3 September 2020) was a Spanish racing cyclist. He competed in the sprint event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Spain Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from the Province of Valladolid
title: Félix Suárez Colomo
